messages.message: Using `` could result in slower LCP and higher bandwidth. Consider using `` from `next/image` to automatically optimize images. This may incur additional usage or cost from your provider. See: https://nextjs.org/docs/messages/no-img-element

suppressedMessages.message: Unexpected any. Specify a different type.

suggestions.desc: Use `unknown` instead, this will force you to explicitly, and safely assert the type is correct.
Use `never` instead, this is useful when instantiating generic type parameters that you don't need to know the type of.

suppressedMessages.message: img elements must have an alt prop, either with meaningful text, or an empty string for decorative images.
